Name: Mezquita (band)
rawData:
Mezquita were a Spanish rock band famous for having released Recuerdos de mi tierra (1979). It is a mix of flamenco-rock and progressive rock that's energetic, powerful and melodic from start to finish.
They released a second album, Califas del rock, in 1981.
This article about a Spanish band or other musical ensemble is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
